IT could also be jitter in your gyro.  Jitter in your gyro could be the result of electrical noise or just the gyro itself.  The pigeon does have some drift problems and slow response compared to the newer gyros.    Or more likely than gyro jitter it could be some oscellation in your steer PID.  You could look at the tollerances on the steer pid to see if it is too
